title: Hobie Mirage Seat - Twist Lock
features: Does not fit Inflatable Mirage kayaks
Fits Mirage kayaks produced in 2012 or later
description: The Hobie Mirage Seat Back fits all Hobie Mirage series kayaks produced in 2012 and later. Features inflatable lumbar support and the twist-lock seat pegs. If you are unsure if this is the proper seat, contact us with your serial number and well help to identify the proper seat.
